wasteManagementPractices.title: Source Separation
wasteManagementPractices.description: Sorting waste into categories like recyclables.

wasteManagementPractices.title: Composting
wasteManagementPractices.description: Decomposing organic waste to create nutrient-rich soil.

wasteManagementPractices.title: Waste Minimization
wasteManagementPractices.description: Reducing waste generation by using resources efficiently.

wasteManagementPractices.title: Landfill Management
wasteManagementPractices.description: Managing landfills by compacting waste and controlling emissions.

wasteManagementPractices.title: Incineration
wasteManagementPractices.description: Burning waste at high temperatures to convert it into energy.

wasteManagementPractices.title: Manage Hazardous Waste
wasteManagementPractices.description: Disposal and treatment of hazardous waste to prevent risks.

wasteManagementPractices.title: Waste-to-Energy
wasteManagementPractices.description: Converting waste into energy through anaerobic digestion.

wasteManagementPractices.title: Public and Education
wasteManagementPractices.description: Educating communities on proper waste disposal and recycling.
